This is my first practice with git. 

Here is some code:

```{r}
# Load the tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

# Generate a tibble with two columns, x and y
plot_df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(1000),
  y = x^2
)

# Scatterplot of that tibble
ggplot(data = plot_df, aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()
```
